title: Cyber‑Noir Landing Page Hero + nightlife brand assets

requirements.text: Redesign the Landing Page hero section to a Dark Mode “Cyber‑Noir Luxury” look using a full-bleed background image of a live jazz band with a 60% black overlay so white hero text remains legible, and include a primary neon purple-to-pink gradient CTA button labeled “Book Now”.

quotes: I want to start with the Landing Page. Please generate a Hero Section using the 'Cyber-Noir' palette with a Neon Purple 'Book Now' button and a background image of a live jazz band.
Key Change: Move from a white corporate look to a "Dark Mode Immersive" experience.
Effect: Overlay a 60% black opacity layer so white text pops on top.

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page hero uses a jazz-band background image rendered from a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated/.
A dark overlay approximating 60% black opacity is visible on top of the hero background image.
Hero headline text remains present and readable in English on dark background.
Primary CTA button text reads exactly “Book Now” and uses a purple→pink neon gradient styling (Tailwind gradient classes acceptable).
Hero section renders correctly on mobile and desktop breakpoints without horizontal overflow.

requirements.text: Add required nightlife brand image assets as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and wire them into the UI where applicable on the Landing Page (header branding + favicon) without routing images through the backend.

quotes: You need these specific assets to sell the "premium" nightlife feel.

acceptanceCriteria: New image assets are added under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames requested.
Landing page header uses the new logo image asset instead of the current icon-only branding (keep text allowed, but logo must be visible).
frontend/index.html (or equivalent supported mechanism) references the new favicon file so the browser shows the neon favicon.

requirements.text: Implement Cyber‑Noir UI styling tokens on the Landing Page hero (deep navy/charcoal background, white headings, slate body text, neon purple gradient primary action, subtle glow) consistent with the user-provided design system, without switching to pure black (#000000).

quotes: Background: Deep Navy (#0f172a) or Charcoal (#111827) — Never pure black (#000000).
Primary Action: Neon Purple Gradient (bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 to-pink-600).
Text: White for headings; Slate-400 for body text.
Glows: Add subtle drop-shadow-glow to primary buttons.

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page hero background uses a dark navy/charcoal feel (not pure black).
Heading text is white and body text uses a slate-muted color in dark mode.
Primary “Book Now” button uses a purple→pink gradient and has a subtle glow (e.g., via drop-shadow/ring/shadow utilities).
No changes are made to immutable hook/component source paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend immutablePaths (must compose existing UI components rather than modifying them).
All user-facing text in the updated hero must be in English.
Store and serve images as static assets from the frontend (frontend/public/assets/generated); do not route image delivery through the backend.
Keep the app Dark Mode behavior (ThemeProvider defaultTheme="dark") intact; do not add a password/forgot-password flow (Internet Identity has no passwords).
nonGoals: Do not implement the “Live Gigs Tonight” ticker or “Trending Artists” carousel in this build (Landing Page hero only).
Do not redesign the /admin dashboard to glassmorphism or add new admin widgets (“Live Pulse”, “Escrow Vault”) in this build.
Do not redesign the Musician “Gig Wallet” states (locked vs available) in this build.
Do not implement the optional 10-second looping hero video in this build (use the still image background for now).
Do not add third-party icon packs beyond the existing Lucide React usage; only adjust styling/glow states where needed later.

required: Neon gradient logo on dark background, stylized “E” or sound wave combined with a location pin (logo_full_dark_mode.png.dim_1024x1024.png)
Neon favicon mark matching the logo style, simplified for small sizes (favicon_neon.png.dim_256x256.png)
High-resolution dark-toned photo of a live jazz band performing, warm venue lighting, crowd energy (hero_jazz_band_bg.dim_2400x1350.jpg)
Dark sleek musician avatar silhouette with headphones or guitar (placeholder_musician_avatar.dim_512x512.png)
Generic venue cover image: clinking glasses or stage lights, dark nightlife feel (placeholder_venue_cover.dim_1600x900.jpg)
Wallet icon with neon/glow styling suitable for dark UI (icon_wallet_glow.dim_256x256.png)
Calendar icon with neon/glow styling suitable for dark UI (icon_calendar_glow.dim_256x256.png)

goalsToAdd: Refresh the app’s look to a Cyber‑Noir Luxury dark-mode nightlife aesthetic, starting with the Landing Page hero.
preferencesToAdd: Dark Mode Only visual direction for marketing/landing surfaces; neon purple→pink gradients and subtle glow effects.
